reviewText: Amazing model train sets!  the young man that explains the trains speaks very clearly and is easy for young children to understand.  My grandsons watch these videos over and over!
If you have a child who loves toy trains then you will be a hero for ordering this. My son has watched this at least 30 times and counting...

I thought my son would wear out the discs. Once he "grew up" too much to admit loving these dvd's I donated them to our local library so other train lovers could continue to love them. I envision my son as a man eventually tracking the series down to repurchase them in whatever format is used at that time.
Skip this and go back to the whole set of I Love Toy trains. Thsi is more just a finale movie.  The rst of the series rocks though.
If your child loves trains like mine does, this is a must have.  It is mesmerizing to watch.  Not a super high quality production, but fasinating nonetheless...

If you already own any of "I Love Toy Trains" Volumes 1-12, you probably don't need this unless you're a completist.  It's like those TV shows that periodically have an episode strung together with scenes from older shows - this volume has a lot of recycled footage built around some new footage.  For the price you're probably better off buying one of the other "I Love Toy Trains" DVD sets first.
My kids love the whole series
My son loves trains so he really enjoyed this video.  Thank you!
my kid is a train addict and these videos are a staple in our house.
My three-year-old son adores all of the Toy Trains videos, and this one is his current favorite.
My 2 year old loves trains and he loves this little movie.
Our boys are a big fan of trains--all kinds.  This they say is exceleent and entertaining.  They give this video 5 stars!
